input: The train departs at 7:45 a.m. sharp. Please ensure you arrive at the station early. Tickets can be purchased online or at the counter.
output:
It is important to note that the train leaves the station at exactly 7:45 a.m.. You need to get there on time, so make sure to arrive early. You can either buy your ticket(s) online or purchase it from the ticket counter.

It is also important to remember that the train leaves at 7:45 a.m.. Your arrival at the station must be timely. You can acquire your ticket either via the internet or right from the ticket counter.

Do keep in mind that the train departs at precisely 7:45 a.m.. Be sure to arrive early, as one way is through buying tickets online and the other being at the station's counter.
